cloudsync.description: Displays a menu giving credit to the author and the help menu command.

cloudsync.*.description: Grants access to all aspects of the plugin, including every permission node.

cloudsync.all.description: Grants access to all aspects of the plugin, including every permission node.

cloudsync.use.description: Grants access to basic plugin commands.

cloudsync.reload.description: Grants access to the reload command.

cloudsync.updates.description: Grants access to the updates command.

cloudsync.upgrade.description: Grants access to the upgrade command.
